text: Ten Days to Tulara is a 1958 American adventure film directed by George Sherman, written by Laurence E. Mascott, and starring Sterling Hayden, Grace Raynor, Rodolfo Hoyos, Jr., Carlos Múzquiz, Tony Carbajal and Juan García. It was shot in Mexico and released on October 29, 1958, by United Artists. ==Plot== == Cast == *Sterling Hayden as Scotty *Grace Raynor as Teresa *Rodolfo Hoyos, Jr. as Cesar *Carlos Múzquiz as Dario *Tony Carbajal as Francisco *Juan García as Piranha *Rafael Alcayde as Mexican colonel *Félix González as Marco *José Pulido as Mexican captain *M. Badager as Luis *Milton Bernstein as Mexican lieutenant *Barry Grail as Mexican doctor *Paco Arenas as Chris == References == == External links == * Category:1958 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:United Artists films Category:American adventure films Category:1958 adventure films Category:Films directed by George Sherman Category:Films shot in Mexico
title: Ten Days to Tulara
